channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole on junction of Chepstow Way and Farmington Road, 18th March
item.description:
Pothole has been there for some time but is now very deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Chedworth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadwork notice in wrong place, 18th March
item.description:
The sign saying there will be roadworks on 22nd March 2021 is in the wrong place. It isIn the middle of Greenhills Road in Charlton Kings, but it needs to be at the Pilley Bridge roundabout , Charlton Lane so that people know they canâ€™t get through at the end of that road. At the moment if they see the sign where it is they will have to do a three point turn in the middle of the road to be able to get out again. This is totally wrong and needs sorting out before the road works commence on the 22nd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 111 Charlton Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really bad pothole!, 18th March
item.description:
There's a REALLY BAD pothole here in the left hand lane on the M5 between the bridge and the junction. Made a very loud bang when driven over and I had to pull over and check my wheels were ok. I'm disgusted to see the complete lack of care from Highways England because this exact pothole was reported OVER A MONTH AGO and still hasn't been fixed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes outside 1 Lipson road., 18th March
item.description:
Busses go past every half an hour and my whole house shakes! Cracks now appearing in my walls and ceilings!! Reported already about 3 weeks ago. Please hurry!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Lipson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in terrible condition, 17th March
item.description:

item.title: Green and yellow lights out, 16th March
item.description:
The light on the centre of the roundabout which faces towards the A40 eastbound traffic has the green and yellow lights out, this has been broken since December and means the first car often does not realise the lights have gone green because they cannot see any of the other lights on the road/roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on zigzags and in disabled bah, 16th March
item.description:
This morning 16/03 there were 6 cars parked on the keep clear zigzags outside Innsworth Infant School on Luke Lane. There were also 2 cars across the disable bay neither displayed blue badges. This happens every school drop off 9am and pick up 3pm. The school do nothing to discourage it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pumping Station Luke Lane, Innsworth
Report on FixMyStreet
